hadiths.text: It was narrated from Qatadah that he said that he heard Juray bin Kulaib narrate that he heard ‘Ali narrate that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade sacrificing animals with broken horns and ears

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ أَنْ يُضَحَّى بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What is disliked to use for a sacrifice
